attributes.action: Repeal all race,religious,and sex laws.as they are unfair
attributes.additional_details:
Uk/eu governments must repeal all race,religious and sex laws,as they are devisive
And a security threat,as they hamper the efficiency of our police,judiciary government officers,and security services,from doing their job properly,and putting our communities in danger,also destroying our social and cultural cohesion too.

rejection.details: This is too general to answer.   Please resubmit being more specific about which laws.   Many thanks.
